summary: Overhauled Dragonscale Armor in a dark theme, for both sexes.
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------
 Added screenshots of pnkrd\'s Crown Helmets using my textures, if you don\'t already have this awesome mod I highly recommend it.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5803]Crown Helmets[/url]

-----------------------------
Jan 18th, 2012 - Black Dragonscale Hi-Res V2 released.
-----------------------------

 This retexture started out as a high resolution, desaturated alternative to the default Dragonscale armor, version 2, however, takes things abit further.

 Highlights of V2:
 
- Armor now boast\'s a darker theme all-around and is no longer green hued in certain lighting conditions.

- Metal parts of the armor have been shined up, simulating increased reflectivity without altering cubemaps or the mesh, have also added more details in the form of battle wear and tear (scratches, nicks, etc.) With some ENB configurations this effect may be too pronounced, experiment with ENB settings to find a right balance. I can\'t possibly personally account for every ENB config out there.

- Bone parts overhauled, no longer looks like driftwood! These were completely brushed over by hand in Photoshop CS5.1 to achieve a grittier, more worn-in look.

 Dec 16th, 2011 update
-----------------------------  
 By request, added a high resolution alternative for the original (Vanilla) Dragonscale Armor and Shield.
-----------------------------

 To install, extract the archive to your Skyrim directory, or install with NMM (Nexus Mod Manager).

 Recommended to install with NMM.
author: Varta
